title: Sensemaking & Complexity, Dave Snowden
description:
Dave Snowden is one of the originators of the field of sensemaking, and the creator of influential frameworks such as the Cynefin model.

In this conversation with David Fuller, he talks about the origin of his work, and how it applies to the pandemic landscape.

You can find out more about Dave's work here: https://www.cognitive-edge.com/

Rebel Wisdom is running our course, Sensemaking 101, starting on October 7th, find out more here: https://rebelwisdom.co.uk/courses/sensemaking-101-page
